item.title: Linux Script to Decrypt Files
item.description: Here is a shell script to decrypt a folder of files that was originally encrypted with openssl. #! /bin/bash #Disclaimer: This script is provided “as -is” for use at your sole risk without any warranty, whether #express or implied of its accuracy, completeness, fitness for a particular purpose. The author accepts no liability for any damages or data loss you may sustain even #if it has been advised of the possibility of such damages.
